title: OneUp Launches Very Thin Clip Pedals
content:
OneUp Components, makers of some of our favorite dropper posts, just announced its all-new Clip Pedals ($159.99). These pedals utilize the SPD interface, come in eight colors, and are designed to be capable enough for all activities where riders prefer solid foot retention: gravel, XC, trail, enduro, and downhill. Best of all, they sport a very thin profile, with a 14.4 mm body and 26.8 mm binding.
